img.alt: A picture of Matt Rice, a friendly and intelligent young man.

div.p: SwiftDismiss is a Progressive Web App for managing school dismissal. It is currently in parallel deployment testing alongside my previous app and is scheduled to be released to other schools this summer.
SVG Morph Creates SMIL or CSS morph animations between any scalable vector graphics (SVG) images. I created it for this website and to create cinematic credits animations for a movie I produced.
I led a six person team to create Tumblewords in one week.
A simple React/Firebase app that I used to call classes to the school Christmas concert.
A spaced repetition flashcard program inspired by Anki that I coded for my 6th grade students to study for their midterm.
A Vanilla JS app tightly integrated with Google Classroom API to track student participation.
UltraCrew is a full-stack webapp using Django that predicts when a ultramarathon runner will arrive at aid stations. Users can define their own races with variable numbers of aid stations.
